sentences.english: And when love speak, the voice of all thd gods makes heaven drowsy with the harmony.
sentences.chinese: 当爱说话时，众爱的声音使苍天沉浸在和谐的静寂中。

sentences.english: There is the silence of the siesta.
Somewhere there is an end to everything， and the loneness of the dark is one's own.
sentences.chinese: 万事都有个终结，黑暗的静寂是个人独有的。

sentences.english: As they fell silent the room was stiller than a country lane.
sentences.chinese: 他们不作声时，屋子里比乡间小道还要静寂。

sentences.english: And though death may hide me, and the greater silence enfold me.
sentences.chinese: 即使死神将我的身形藏匿，更浩瀚的静寂将我包围。

sentences.english: As quiet as the funeral parlor had been.
sentences.chinese: 这种静寂就像殡仪馆中的宁静。

sentences.english: Leaned out, leaning, hushing the room enclosed.
sentences.chinese: 探出身来，斜倚着，使紧闭的房间一片静寂。

sentences.english: It was the lull before the storm.
sentences.chinese: 鸿渐知道这是暴风雨前的静寂。

sentences.english: Will final spasm be followed by silence?
sentences.chinese: 会是在最后的痉挛之后归于静寂吗？

sentences.english: But don’t be fooled by its sleepy 1)appearance, there’s a lot more bubbling just beneath the surface.
sentences.chinese: 但别被它静寂的外表骗倒，沉静的表面下热血沸腾。
神圣的静寂和宽慰慢慢沉落。

sentences.english: There was fire everywhere and silence and bodies were burning.
sentences.chinese: 火焰四起，一片静寂，很多人被烧了。

sentences.english: The sudden sound of footsteps in silence made her blood run cold.
sentences.chinese: 静寂中突然响起的脚上声使她感到毛骨悚然。

sentences.english: Drearily sink into every silent night.
sentences.chinese: 凄然沉没于每个静寂的夜。

sentences.english: Before long, the once quiet neighborhood became active with the sounds of a child.
sentences.chinese: 不久，孩子的吵闹声使从前静寂的邻里不再安静。

sentences.english: Its peace has been used to encourage passiveness, and this was never the intent.
sentences.chinese: 它的静寂被利用，去鼓励顺从，这绝非真正的意图。

definition: not a sound to be heard (idiom)
not a sound to be heard (idiom)/dead silent
